short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extensions to make it easier to find listing ads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to find listings more easily.
Listing ads at the top of the page can be easily found by turning the background color pink. Also, ads at the bottom of the page will be moved to the top with a yellow background color.
